line_1: Or envy those who early slumber.
line_2: Full many a watchful hour shall number,

line_1: "A little more Sleep, and a little more Slumber;"
line_2: Thus he wastes half his Days, and his Hours without Number;

line_1: And there expects his breaking Slumber.
line_2: She to a Vault transports the Lumber,

line_1: HUSH! my dear, lie still and slumber,
